name: HAWKEYE Control Panel Server
tagline: Node.js-backed UI server for REDHAWK SDR
body:
## HAWKEYE Control Panel Server

***

HAWKEYE is a Node.js-based server providing a streaming gateway to REDHAWK SDR systems.  This clean integration allows for event-driven user interfaces and control panels to be rapidly developed using the provided jQuery Widgets.

Introduction: [HAWKEYE](http://geontech.com/redhawk/hawkeye-user-interface/)

Also see the **Documentation/index.html** for more details.
